itunes:title: Can't We All Just Get Along?? | Ep. 7
title: Can't We All Just Get Along?? | Ep. 7
itunes:author: Yeah No I Know, Jenna, Brooklin & Kristen Leanne
description: There's a lot of hate and division in the world today, which is how we stumbled upon this topic of "can't we all just get along?". Today's episode is our take on how you can completely disagree with a friend, family member or complete stranger on anything under the sun (weight, religion, politics to name a few) and still treat each other with kindness, love, and respect.
content:encoded: There's a lot of hate and division in the world today, which is how we stumbled upon this topic of "can't we all just get along?". Today's episode is our take on how you can completely disagree with a friend, family member or complete stranger on anything under the sun (weight, religion, politics to name a few) and still treat each other with kindness, love, and respect.
